I voted to pass the #PaycheckFairness Act in March, which would help eliminate the pay gap by ensuring #EqualPay for equal work. 

@senatemajldr and the Senate have yet to take a vote on this bill. American workers deserve better.

Today is #BlackWomensEqualPayDay.

Black women earn only 61 cents for every $1 earned by white men for the same work. 

This should shock us all. We can and must do better. https://cnb.cx/30ClVRO¬†
